long_description:
Introduces an item, *the Tool Watcher*, for monitoring the durability of the player wield tool. After using the tool watcher once it will alert the player whenever their equipment is close to breaking through a HUD text as long as it is kept in that player inventory.

The Tool Watcher recipe consists of: mese crystal, glass, stick and steel ingot, it requires the default mod in order to be crafted.
name: tool_watcher
